document_data.caption: A map showing Duke's Way in Daggerford.
document_data.name: Duke's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Duke's Way''' was a road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Duke's Way began at the [[Caravan Gate]] entering Daggerford from the west. It continued east through the center of the city before terminating at the [[Ducal Castle]] which covered most of eastern Daggerford.
document_data.Notable Locations:
The [[Hill Road]] intersected Duke's Way at the base of the landrise the separated the ducal estate from the rest of Daggerford, while the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] branched south from the Hill Road near the drill field. Notable buildings located along Duke's Way included:

* The [[Ducal Castle]]
* [[Daggerford Inn]]
* The [[Grand Playhouse]]
* [[Kryptgarden Scrolls]]
* [[Morninglow Tower]]
* [[Oryv's Cloth Emporium]]
